title: Enhanced thermoelectric properties of Cu1.8S via the introduction of ZnS nanostructures
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01275E, Paper
Gouri Sankar, Madhuvathani Saminathan, Suresh Perumal, R. Tamilarasi, Geetha Arunachalam
A composite of polycrystalline Cu1.8S with nanostructured ZnS was synthesised using the hydrothermal method, along with sintering and cold pressing. The compositing introduced defects such as point defects, grain boundaries and stacking faults, collectively reducing Îº and enhancing zT.
